Class GameSettings

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.models.GameSettings
public class GameSettings extends Object
Manages game settings including key bindings. Settings are persisted to a properties file.

    • resetToDefaults

      public void resetToDefaults()
      Resets all key bindings to their default values. Does not automatically save; call saveSettings() to persist changes.
